mapper.insert: insert into building_owner(id_card, sex, link, owner_type_cd, remark, owner_id, user_id, name, state, community_id, age, member_id, address) values (#{idCard}, #{sex}, #{link}, #{ownerTypeCd}, #{remark}, #{ownerId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{state}, #{communityId}, #{age}, #{memberId}, #{address})
mapper.select:
select count(DISTINCT t.member_id) count from building_owner t left join owner_app_user oau on t.community_id = oau.community_id and t.member_id = oau.member_id and oau.status_cd = '0' where t.status_cd = '0'
and oau.member_id is null
and oau.member_id is not null
and t.community_id= #{communityId}
